title: Inflation, Crypto, Commodities, And Credit (Podcast)
itunes:title: Inflation, Crypto, Commodities, And Credit (Podcast)
description:
Kara Murphy, CIO at Kestra Holdings, joins the show to discuss the Inflation Reduction Act’s impact on inflation, the economy, and investing. Everett Millman, Chief Markets Analyst at Gainsville Coins, joins the show to discuss commodities, Bitcoin sinking, and investing. Soren Bjorn, President, Driscoll’s of the Americas, talks about food prices, inflation, and the supply chain. Carmen Arroyo, credit reporter with Bloomberg News, joins the show to discuss her story this morning on banks’ retreat from mortgage lending. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
